trans-unit.source: Provides a way to translate property values between Windows Forms controls and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> class to define translations between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] properties and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] properties in a hybrid application.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> clase para definir las traducciones entre [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] propiedades y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] propiedades en una aplicación híbrida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> classes define mappings from one technology to the other.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedades en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> las clases definen las asignaciones de una tecnología a otra.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx) and [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the WindowsFormsHost Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: propiedades de asignación mediante el ElementHost Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx) y [Tutorial: propiedades de asignación utilizando el elemento WindowsFormsHost](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to replace the default mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo reemplazar la asignación predeterminada para la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> propiedad en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: De plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: de plena confianza para los herederos.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede heredar código de confianza parcial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> class.
The object which has the properties to be translated.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> class with the given source object.
`source` is the source of the properties which are translated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
trans-unit.target: `source` es el origen de las propiedades que se convierten mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.

trans-unit.source: The properties which are mapped in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> must exist on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades que se asignan en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> debe existir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegates are called using the current property values on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> los delegados se llaman mediante los valores de propiedad actuales en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to map.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate which is called when <c>propertyName</c> changes.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate for the given property to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" />.
When setting, if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> exists for `propertyName`, the new delegate is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se establece, si no hay ningún <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> existe para `propertyName`, el delegado nueva se agrega a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> already exists for `propertyName`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Si un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> ya existe para `propertyName`, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> se genera.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> has an existing mapping.
The name of the property to translate.
Runs the property translator for the given property, based on the source object's current property value.
The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject" />.
Runs the property translator for each mapped property, based on the source object's current property values.
Removes all property mappings.
The name of the property to search for.
Gets a value indicating whether the given property is mapped.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="propertyName" /> exists in the property map; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets a collection of property mappings which are defined by default.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> which maps property names to corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> que asigna nombres de propiedad a los delegados del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> correspondientes.

trans-unit.source: For a list of default property mappings, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de asignaciones de propiedad predeterminadas, vea [Windows Forms y la asignación de propiedad de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to map.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate for the given property.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate corresponding to the property specified by <paramref name="propertyName" />.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegado correspondiente a la propiedad especificada por <paramref name="propertyName" />.

trans-unit.source: When setting, if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> exists for `propertyName`, the new delegate is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se establece, si no hay ningún <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> existe para `propertyName`, el delegado nueva se agrega a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> already exists for `propertyName`, it is replaced.
trans-unit.target: Si un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> ya existe para `propertyName`, se reemplaza.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo recuperar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegado para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo recuperar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegado para la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string; the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate is <see langword="null" />.
The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject" />.
Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing the property names in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing the property names of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> objeto que contiene los nombres de propiedad de la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> colección.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is raised by a property translator.

Handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.PropertyMappingError> event can optionally raise the exception by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> flag on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMappingExceptionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controladores para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.PropertyMappingError> evento, opcionalmente, puede producir la excepción estableciendo el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> marca en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMappingExceptionEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to remove.
Deletes the given property from the mapping.
The following code example shows how to remove a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo quitar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar una asignación para la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The name of the property to restore.
Restores the default property mapping for the given property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.Reset%2A> method has the following effects on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.Reset%2A> método tiene los efectos siguientes el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.

trans-unit.source: A default property mapping that has been removed is restored.
trans-unit.target: Se restaura una asignación de propiedad predeterminada que se ha quitado.

trans-unit.source: A property mapping that has been added is removed.
trans-unit.target: Se quita una asignación de propiedad que se ha agregado.

trans-unit.source: A default property mapping that has been overridden is restored to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Una asignación de propiedad predeterminada que se ha reemplazado se restaura a su valor predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Restores the default property mappings.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.ResetAll%2A> method has the following effects on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.ResetAll%2A> método tiene los efectos siguientes el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.

trans-unit.source: Default property mappings that have been removed are restored.
trans-unit.target: Se restauran las asignaciones de propiedad predeterminadas que se han quitado.

trans-unit.source: Property mappings that have been added are removed.
trans-unit.target: Se quitan las asignaciones de propiedad que se han agregado.

trans-unit.source: Default property mappings that have been overridden are restored to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Asignaciones de propiedad predeterminadas que se han reemplazado se restauran en sus valores predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object which has the properties to be translated.
The object which has the properties to be translated.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que tiene las propiedades que se deben traducir.

trans-unit.source: The properties which are mapped in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> must exist on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades que se asignan en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> debe existir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing the property translators in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing the property translators in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contiene los traductores de propiedades en el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> colección.
